titles.title: Electing certain minority members to certain standing committees.
Electing certain minority members to certain standing committees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects certain named Minority Members to specified House Committees.
